title: JP Morgan || Compensation || SE3 || Bengaluru
content:
Education: Tier 3 BCA | Tier 1 Mtech(Work Integrated)
Years of Experience: 5 YOE
Current Company : Service Based.
Current : 11LPA
Tech Stack : Java, SpringBoot, Azure cloud, Microservices

Date of the Offer: Jun 2024
Company: JP Morgan Chase & Co.
Title/Level: Software Engineer III
Location: Bengaluru
Salary: 29LPA(Fixed)
Relocation Bonus: None(Already in Bengaluru)
Joining Bonus: None
Stock bonus: None
Total = 29LPA
IDK what is the performance bonus in JP Morgan.

Counter offers : None but onsite interviews scheduled for google.

Interview Experience https://leetcode.com/discuss/interview-experience/5435610/JP-Morgan-or-SE3-or-Bengaluru-or-Interview-Experience-or-Offer

title: National Instruments | Staff Software Engineer (IC 2)| Bangalore | Lowball | Declined
content:
* Education: B.Tech in CSE
* Years of Experience: 3
* Prior Experience: IT Software Developer at a top semiconductor product based company
* Date of the Offer: June 2024
* Company: National Instruments
* Title/Level: Staff Software Engineer (IC 2)
* Location: Bangalore
* Salary: 18 LPA
* Relocation: 1.5 LPA
* Signing Bonus: 3 LPA (half payable now, other half payable after 1 yr)
* Stock bonus: Nil
* Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 
	* 1st year: 22.5 LPA
	* Afterwards: 18 LPA
* Benefits: Don't know much.
* Interview details: Online test -> DSA Round -> Technical Round on Python -> Managerial Round
* Other details: Expected at least 22 - 25 LPA fixed from them.
